docs.lead_paragraph: "We need more sunlight in the treatment of disease," said Dr. J. Mount Bleyer yesterday to a reporter for THE NEW YORK TIMES. "Whatever the Rontgen rays are they must be contained in some form hitherto imperceptible to us in ordinary sunlight.

headline.main: MORE SUNLIGHT NEEDED; Dr. Bleyer's Views as to Its Effect in Promoting Health. HOW HE WOULD CONSTRUCT HOSPITALS Suggests Wards One Story in Height, Built of Iron and Glass -- Germs Killed by the Sun.

docs.abstract: League of Junior Patrons and Patronesses' Reception
